name: mikrochat
description: The minimalist chat app that's all yours
author: Mikael Vesavuori

scripts.dev:reload: npm run build:web && mv dist/mikrochat.min.js app && clear && npm start
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:web && npm run build:api
scripts.build:web: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node build.mjs && npm run move:webapp:files
scripts.build:api: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.move:webapp:files: cp -R icons dist && cp app/mikrosafe.min.js dist && cp app/manifest.json dist && cp app/offline.html dist && cp app/pwa.js dist && cp app/service-worker.js dist
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib && rm -rf dist && mkdir lib
